to steal; to rob; to plunder; thief; bandit; robber
украсть; Грабить; грабить; вор; бандит; грабитель

heisig_chinese_memo: The master thief is so good he can steal all of your dishes one by one as you finish washing them with water.  All the while he is yawning because it's too easy and you never notice that there are no dishes drying.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You are so poor you dont know where your next dish will come from all you know is that you will have to become a master thief and steal it.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscription from "㳄" from " boat ", "㳄" is like a person drooling, " boat " means that it is related to boating and river water, and the whole word means that the river is flooded (Xu Zhongshu) and overflows the river bank. Strictly speaking, this word is not the word " pirate " for later generations to mean stealing, but the same character. Since ordinary scholars call it " pirate ", it is temporarily included here.

In oracle bone inscriptions, the common false is " yan ", which means flooding, flooding, flooding, etc. (Yu Shengwu). "Collection" 8315: "Huan Qi Pirate", the river name " Huan ", also known as Anyang River, is located in northern Henan Province. The whole sentence means that Huan Shui will overflow. It means " envy " when it is said to be false, which also means overflowing and flooding (Zhang Zhenghong). Clementine is falsely called " Yan ", and his father Xin Zhuo: "His father (Yan) Xin" means that he welcomes his father Xin.

As for the "theft of the Pirates ' words, from"㳄"from" dish ","㳄"Elephant Man mouth salivating, drooling (from"㳄of "" envy "the word, express envy, greed)," dish "is the vessel , " Stealing " means coveting and greedy for other people's wealth, which means stealing and robbery. "Said Wen": "Stealing, private property. From 㳄, 㳄 who want to dish." Duan Yucai's note: "Zhou Gong said: "Stealing bribes is stealing, stealing weapons is a traitor." "Mibu" said: "Stealing From the middle of it, it is called stealing."" The text on the silk and silk expresses theft, "Sleeping Tiger Di Qin Jian. Law Questions and Answers" Jian 103: "The son steals his parents", which means that the son steals his parents. "Mawangdui. Line 156 of the Old Unused Book before the Second Volume of Lao Zi: "The amount of stolen (grain)".
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jinwen from "㳄" from " boat ". "㳄" starts from " owing " from counting points, " owing " is like people opening their mouths, counting points like saliva, "㳄" like people opening their mouths and drooling, from " boats ", it is suspected to be related to river water, the whole word means that the river is overflowing meaning.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「㳄」從「舟」，「㳄」象人流口水，「舟」表示與行船、河水有關，全字表示河水氾濫（徐中舒），溢出河岸。此字嚴格來說，不是後世表示偷盜的「盜」字，而是同形異字。由於一般學者隸定為「盜」，故暫收錄於此。

　　甲骨文中通假為「衍」，表示淹蓋、淹浸、泛濫等義（于省吾）。《合集》8315：「洹其盜」，「洹」河流名，又名安陽河，在河南省北部。全句意謂洹水會泛濫。一說通假為「羨」，也表示衍溢、泛濫之意（張政烺）。金文通假為「延」，逆盜父辛觶：「逆盜（延）父辛」，表示迎接延請父辛。

　　至於偷盜的「盜」字，從「㳄」從「皿」，「㳄」象人張口垂涎、流口水（從「㳄」的「羨」字，表示羨慕、貪慕），「皿」是器皿，「盜」表示對別人的財富垂涎，貪慕別人的財產，引申為偷盜、搶劫。《說文》：「盜，私利物也。从㳄，㳄欲皿者。」段玉裁注：「周公曰：『竊賄爲盜，盜器爲姦。』〈米部〉曰：『盜自中出曰竊。』」簡帛文字表示盜竊，《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡103：「子盜父母」，意謂子盜竊父母。《馬王堆．老子乙本卷前古佚書》第156行：「盜量（糧）」。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「㳄」從「舟」。「㳄」從「欠」從數點，「欠」象人張口，數點象口液，「㳄」象人張開口流口水，從「舟」，疑與河水有關，全字表示河水泛濫之意。

Chinese: The master thief is so good he can steal all of your dishes one by one as you finish washing them with water. All the while he is yawning because it's too easy and you never notice that there are no dishes drying.
Meaning: master thief
Hanzi: 盗
Story: You are so poor you dont know where your next dish will come from all you know is that you will have to become a master thief and steal it.
Kind: traditional

甲金文從「 㳄 」從「 舟 」，「 㳄 」象人流口水，「 舟 」表示與行船、河水有關，全字表示河水氾濫（徐中舒），溢出河岸。此字嚴格來說，不是後世表示偷盜的「 盜 」字，而是同形異字。由於一般學者隸定為「 盜 」，故暫收錄於此。 甲骨文中通假為「 衍 」，表示淹蓋、淹浸、泛濫等義（于省吾）。《合集》8315：「洹其盜」，「 洹 」河流名，又名安陽河，在河南省北部。全句意謂洹水會泛濫。一說通假為「 羨 」，也表示衍溢、泛濫之意（張政烺）。金文通假為「 延 」，逆盜父辛觶：「逆盜（延）父辛」，表示迎接延請父辛。 至於偷盜的「 盜 」字，從「 㳄 」從「 皿 」，「 㳄 」象人張口垂涎、流口水（從「 㳄 」的「 羨 」字，表示羨慕、貪慕），「 皿 」是器皿，「 盜 」表示對別人的財富垂涎，貪慕別人的財產，引申為偷盜、搶劫。《說文》：「盜，私利物也。从㳄，㳄欲皿者。」段玉裁注：「周公曰：『竊賄爲盜，盜器爲姦。』〈米部〉曰：『盜自中出曰竊。』」簡帛文字表示盜竊，《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡103：「子盜父母」，意謂子盜竊父母。《馬王堆．老子乙本卷前古佚書》第156行：「盜量（糧）」。

盜字的基本解释

盜
dào
同“盗”。

盜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dào］
［《廣韻》徒到切，去号，定。］
亦作“盗1”。
(1)偷窃；劫掠。
(2)引申为用不正当的手段谋取。
(3)侵犯。
(4)偷窃或抢劫财物的人。
(5)谗佞的人。
(6)指欺世惑众的人。
(7)对反叛者的贬称。
(8)指外来入侵者。
(9)杀人者；刺客。
(10)私通。
(11)逃避。参见“盜税”。
(12)簒夺。
(13)窃据。
(14)私下；暗中；非法。
(15)浅色或杂色。

盜字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皿字部】　盜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页794第21
〔古文〕????【唐韻】徒到切【集韻】【韻會】大到切【正韻】杜到切，?音導。【說文】私利物也。【易·說卦】坎爲盜。【疏】取水行潛，竊如盜賊也。【左傳·文十八年】竊賄爲盜，盜器爲姦。【周禮·秋官】司隸帥其民而搏盜賊。【詩·小雅】君子信盜，亂是用暴。【傳】盜，逃也。【風俗通】言其晝伏夜奔，逃避人也。　又【正字通】凡隂私自利者皆謂之盜。【穀梁傳·哀四年】春秋有三盜，微殺大夫，謂之盜。非所取而取之，謂之盜。辟中國之正道以襲利，謂之盜。　又泉名。【後漢·郡國志】徐州有盜泉。【說苑】水名盜泉，孔子不飲，醜其名也。　又星名。【宋史·天文志】客星東南，曰盜星。主大盜。　又千里馬名。【穆天子傳】右服盜驪。【爾雅·釋畜疏】駿馬小頸，名曰盜驪。　又草名。【爾雅·釋草疏】蕧一名盜庚。　【六書正譌】㳄卽涎字，欲也，欲皿爲盜，會意。从㳄。俗从次，誤。

盜字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
盜字的起名意思

暂无。

Pirate
Basic explanation of words
Pirate
dào
Same as "pirate".
Pirate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dào］
["Guangyun" only to cut, go to the number, set. ]
Also known as "Pirate 1".
(1) Stealing; looting.
(2) The extension refers to the use of improper means.
(3) Infringement.
(4) A person who steals or robs property.
(5) The slanderous person.
(6) Refers to people who deceive the world and deceive the crowd.
(7) A derogatory term for rebels.
(8) Refers to foreign invaders.
(9) Killers; assassins.
(10) Fornication.
(11) Escape. See "Tax Stealing".
(12) Zanduo.
(13) Stealing data.
(14) In private; secretly; illegally.
(15) Light color or variegated color.
Pirate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Min Zi Department] 　Pirate; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 794 21
[Ancient text]???? [Tang Yun] Disciple to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Big to cut [Zheng Yun] Du to cut, audio guide. [Said the text] Private property also. [Yi·Said Gua] Kan is a thief. 【Sparse】Fetch water and sneak, steal like a thief. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteenth Year of Wen] Stealing bribes is stealing, stealing weapons is evil. 【Zhou Li·Qiu Guan】Si Li commanded his people and fought thieves. [Poetry·Xiaoya] A gentleman believes in pirates, and chaos is violence. [Biography] Steal and escape. 【Tongshutong】It is said that he runs day and night at night to escape from people.　[Zhengzitong] Anyone who is selfish and selfish is a thief. [Guliang Chuan·Ai Four Years] There were three thieves in the Spring and Autumn Period. Taking what is not taken is called theft. The right way to open up China to exploit profits is called theft.　Also named as spring. [The History of the Later Han Dynasty] There are Pirate Springs in Xuzhou. [Said Garden] The name of the water was Pirate Springs, and Confucius did not drink it.　Also star name. [Song History·Astronomy] The southeast of the guest star is called Pirate Star. Lord thief.　The name of the great horse. [Biography of Emperor Mu] The right suit pirates Li. 【Erya·Shu Hu Shu】The small neck of a steed is called Pirate Li.　Also cursive name. [Erya Shi Cao Shu] A thief Geng.　【Six Books Zhengzheng】 㳄卽 salivating words, desire also, desire for pirates, knowing. From 㳄. Vulgar from the second, wrong.
